description:
Kaoruko is a talented young editor working for a publishing company. She`s taking care of http://anidb.net/ch45096 [Akito], and believes he has great talent so she shows concern for him both in regards to her work and privately. She`s a beautiful, caring older women, but her imagination also tends to run wild more than most.
Source: ANN
name: Jinno Kaoruko
